title: Best of the Program | Guests: Riley Moore & Michael Malice | 3/18/22
description:
West Virginia state Treasurer Riley Moore joins to discuss the recent Virginia bill passed that bans financial institutions from dealing with the government if they are boycotting the fossil fuel industry. Glenn and Stu discuss some of the top stories of the week, including the latest on Ukraine. Author Michael Malice joins to discuss the infamous Hunter Biden laptop and the media’s inexcusable cover-up of it.
